channel.title: Error Connecting To Server
channel.description:
Hello, My problem is when I change my Client.JAVA file and modify the ip address and put my no-ip, I can not connect to my server. It says "Error Connecting To Server". But when It is all 127.0.0.1, it works fine. When I change the ip to what I said before, and run my server, I can't connect. Should I change anything else in my Source Files??
I have a really good server at the moment, being devoleped, and I just decided to see if anybody else could join, I changed the I.P., and now I can't log on.

item.title: Error Connecting To Server
item.dc:creator: @iBuffo iBuffo
item.description:
@iBuffo wrote:

buut15:

Did you portfoward that port on your router?

Yes I did

Quote "
modify the ip address on EGUI.java
"
I have no EGUI.java just a GUI.java

Read full topic
